question: You have just read an article in an international travel magazine which contained some information about your town that is incorrect. Write a letter to the editor of magazine. In your letter-	correct the information in the article-	explain why it is important for the magazine to give correct information-	suggest what the magazine should do about this situation.
text: I am writing you this letter to correct the information about  my hometown, Istanbul, which your article contains much wrong information.

Firstly, Alaloha is located on the beach of Karadeniz and is not a Middle East city. Although it is one of the most visited places in the world, your international travel magazine writes that terrorism is everywhere. There is no  terrorist attack or rape of women.

However, drawing the wrong image harms this beautiful tourist attraction. With this in mind, people can travel to Istanbul safely with their families. Although you have to direct people visiting it, you discourage them.

In conclusion, since you made some mistakes, you have to fix them by writing a new article which corrects the wrong information. Please keep in mind that giving wrong information leads to the opening of  lawsuits.
I look forward to hearing good news from you as soon as possible.
